}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''[[Buffalo]]''''s product page states this is a '''PRISM 2.5''' device.
Additional specifications, per '''[[Buffalo]]''''s product page, follow... *Dimensions (W x H x D): 84 mm x 25 mm x 12 mm *Weight: 20 g
